text: Cisterna d'Asti is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Asti in the Italian region Piedmont, located about southeast of Turin and about southwest of Asti. On 31 December 2004, it had a population of 1,257 and an area of .All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat.
